headline: A Fresh Look at Joby Aviation (JOBY) Valuation as Uber Partnership and Blade Deal Accelerate Urban Air Mobility
summary: Joby Aviation (JOBY) just grabbed the spotlight with a pair of fast-moving headlines: the strategic acquisition of Blade’s passenger business and a new partnership with Uber Technologies. Soon, urban travelers in cities like New York could book helicopter and seaplane rides through the Uber app, signaling Joby’s intent to rapidly scale access to urban air mobility. This news is not just about smoother city hops; it is a clear move toward making air taxis mainstream and gives investors a...
